data.title: The 5 Best Indoor Go Kart Tracks in Northern California!
data.meta_description: World-famous K1 Speed has the best indoor go-kart tracks in NorCal! Here's a list of all 5 centers and where you can find them!
data.text:
If you’re looking for the best indoor go karting experience in Northern California, then look no further than K1 Speed!

K1 Speed is a world-renowned indoor go-kart racing company that has provided an exhilarating racing experience for over two decades. With multiple locations throughout NorCal – EACH with a different track layout – K1 Speed is the perfect destination for anyone looking to satisfy their need for speed.

All of K1 Speed’s centers feature state-of-the-art electric go karts that can travel up to 45 miles per hour! And each center also features karts for juniors that can go up to 20mph!

So if you’re planning a trip or live in the area, here are the 7 K1 Speed tracks you can currently find in Northern California:

K1 Speed Sacramento will take your breath away the moment you set foot in its lobby. Thanks to its floor to ceiling wall of glass, guests can get an impressive view of the track while gazing at the two historic, museum-worthy racecars on display. An upstairs bar features a birds-eye view of the track while you enjoy a post-race briefing with your friends over a cold one. And if you’re looking at hosting an event in the state’s capital, we’ve got tons of private meeting and event rooms to choose from.

As you can see, there’s plenty of great K1 Speed go kart tracks to choose from in Northern California. And since these locations are the best tracks in the area, it doesn’t matter which one you pick – you’ll have a great time! And because every track has a different layout, why not go to as many as you can?

How many of these tracks have YOU been to? Let us know in the comments section below!

Not sure which Northern California track you’re closest to? Hit the button below!
